trans-unit.source: Installing required jar files and adding them to the classpath

seg-source.mrk: Installing required jar files and adding them to the classpath

target.mrk: Installing required jar files and adding them to the classpath

trans-unit.source: To use the Network Server and network client driver, add the following jar file to your server classpath.

seg-source.mrk: To use the Network Server and network client driver, add the following jar file to your server classpath.

target.mrk: To use the Network Server and network client driver, add the following jar file to your server classpath.

seg-source.mrk: derbyclient.jar

target.mrk: derbyclient.jar

seg-source.mrk: derby.jar

target.mrk: derby.jar

seg-source.mrk: derbynet.jar

target.mrk: derbynet.jar

seg-source.mrk: derbyrun.jar

target.mrk: derbyrun.jar

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>derbyrun.jar</codeph>

target.mrk: <codeph>derbyrun.jar</codeph>

trans-unit.source: Adding this file to your classpath has the effect of including all of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> classes in your classpath. These classes are in the following jar files, which you can also add to your classpath separately:

seg-source.mrk: Adding this file to your classpath has the effect of including all of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> classes in your classpath.
These classes are in the following jar files, which you can also add to your classpath separately:

target.mrk: Adding this file to your classpath has the effect of including all of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> classes in your classpath.
These classes are in the following jar files, which you can also add to your classpath separately:

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph>

target.mrk: <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph>

trans-unit.source: This jar file contains the Network Server code. It must be in your classpath to start the Network Server.

seg-source.mrk: This jar file contains the Network Server code.
It must be in your classpath to start the Network Server.

target.mrk: This jar file contains the Network Server code.
It must be in your classpath to start the Network Server.

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>derby.jar</codeph>

target.mrk: <codeph>derby.jar</codeph>

trans-unit.source: This jar file contains the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database engine code. It must be in the classpath in order for the Network Server to access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases. <codeph>derby.jar</codeph> is included in the <codeph>Class-Path</codeph> attribute of <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph>'s manifest file. If you have <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph> in the classpath and <codeph>derby.jar</codeph> is in the same directory as <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph>, it is not necessary to include <codeph>derby.jar</codeph> explicitly.

seg-source.mrk: This jar file contains the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database engine code.
It must be in the classpath in order for the Network Server to access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases.
<codeph>derby.jar</codeph> is included in the <codeph>Class-Path</codeph> attribute of <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph>'s manifest file.

If you have <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph> in the classpath and <codeph>derby.jar</codeph> is in the same directory as <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph>, it is not necessary to include <codeph>derby.jar</codeph> explicitly.

target.mrk: This jar file contains the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database engine code.
It must be in the classpath in order for the Network Server to access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases.
<codeph>derby.jar</codeph> is included in the <codeph>Class-Path</codeph> attribute of <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph>'s manifest file.

If you have <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph> in the classpath and <codeph>derby.jar</codeph> is in the same directory as <codeph>derbynet.jar</codeph>, it is not necessary to include <codeph>derby.jar</codeph> explicitly.

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>derbyclient.jar</codeph>

target.mrk: <codeph>derbyclient.jar</codeph>

trans-unit.source: This jar file contains the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Client JDBC driver that is necessary for communication with the Network Server. It must be in the classpath of the application on the client side in order to access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases over a network.

seg-source.mrk: This jar file contains the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Client JDBC driver that is necessary for communication with the Network Server.
It must be in the classpath of the application on the client side in order to access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases over a network.

target.mrk: This jar file contains the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Client JDBC driver that is necessary for communication with the Network Server.
It must be in the classpath of the application on the client side in order to access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases over a network.

trans-unit.source: All of the jar files are in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/lib</codeph> directory.

seg-source.mrk: All of the jar files are in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/lib</codeph> directory.

target.mrk: All of the jar files are in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/lib</codeph> directory.

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides script files for setting the classpath to work with the Network Server. The scripts are located in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/bin</codeph> directory.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides script files for setting the classpath to work with the Network Server.
The scripts are located in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/bin</codeph> directory.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides script files for setting the classpath to work with the Network Server.
The scripts are located in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/bin</codeph> directory.

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>setNetworkClientCP.bat</codeph> (Windows)

target.mrk: <codeph>setNetworkClientCP.bat</codeph> (Windows)

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>setNetworkClientCP</codeph> (UNIX)

target.mrk: <codeph>setNetworkClientCP</codeph> (UNIX)

seg-source.mrk: <codeph>setNetworkServerCP.bat</codeph> (Windows)

target.mrk: <codeph>setNetworkServerCP.bat</codeph> (Windows)

target.mrk: <codeph>setNetworkServerCP</codeph> (UNIX)
